channel.title: Hi.(questions)
channel.description:
Hi! I am coming from autoruneltd.co.uk and kaitnieks.com. I know a lot about scar and made a lot of scripts in the past(before kaitnieks shut down), and now I want to start again but all I know about scar's status is that not many people use it. Can someone tell me if it works at all, how detectable it is, do many people on this website use it(if not where shuld I go and is there a scar scripting comunity), and any other info. What do thay mean by saying the folowing: "[b]Elite scar scripters community SRL is alive, too.[/b]" in the scar news?
Thank you so much for taking your time to help me. you know ima pimp :D

item.title: Hi.(questions)
item.dc:creator: @yuhaiyang1 yuhaiyang1
item.description:
@yuhaiyang1 wrote:

theres actually 530 members o.0

devs are: WT-Fakawi- Flyboy-dankness-Starblaster-Mutant Squirelee-Renax, Masqey (masqueradar)- Kane- Sdcit- Pyro- mopar, etc. 19 in all[/quote]
